instructions: put the dinner plate on the table cloth, in the center but towards the bottom
put the salad plate on top of the dinner plate
put the napkin on top of the salad plate
put the wine glass on the top right corner of the table cloth
put the water glass to the right of the wine glass and a little bit lower than the wine glass
put the salad fork to the left of the dinner plate with the tines pointing upwards
put the dinner fork between the salad fork and the dinner plate tines facing upwards
put the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate with the blade facing towards the plate
put the soup spoon to the right of the dinner knife, its bowl facing up
